guide.introduction:
Pocket bikes are fun, but are noisy and cant go offroad well. (Ask me how I know)

The solution, an electric mini ATV in this case a mini inverted trike. The build will use a electric trans-axle, lawn tractor tires, and a large swivel coaster. Along with some aluminum tubing and electric scooter controls.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Pocket bikes are fun, but are noisy and cant go offroad well. (Ask me how I know)

The solution, an electric mini ATV in this case a mini inverted trike. The build will use a electric trans-axle, lawn tractor tires, and a large swivel coaster. Along with some aluminum tubing and electric scooter controls.

Relevant parts
  • electric transaxle
  • electric scooter controller
  • hall throttle
  • 1/2 U1 batteries
  • Aluminum tubing
  • Aluminum plate
  • tractor tires
  • 10" swivel caster
  • 1/4" steel plate
  • bike seat
  • 3/8" bolt / nuts
  • 1/8" aluminum arc rods
  • 2" x 2" x .25" Aluminum angle
  • 7/8" Aluminum round tube
  • 1.5" x 1.5" x .125" Aluminum angle
  • Wire 10 gauge
  • Wire ring connecters
  • High Amperage switch
  • misc resistors, buttons, lights
Tools
  • #25 drill bit (10-24)
  • 3/8" or V drillbit
  • Arc welder (SMAW)
  • Combo square
  • Drill
  • Hack saw
  • Metal file
  • Milling machine
  • Pencil
  • Rivet gun / rivets
  • Soldering/desoldering tools
  • Tape measure
  • Welding Gloves
  • Welding hood
  • Welding jacket
  • Wire cutter/stripper
